title: Gromp is too OP to be a monster. Make it a champion.
body:
Gromp, the Toadstool's Gifted

Gromp is a ranged tank who is an exceptional counterjungler. It excels at killing unprepared junglers, and attacking unsuspecting enemies over wall. His basic attack deals execute damage.

replies.body: I'm not going to lie, he's executed me before. :x
Don't Forget Dyrus!
I need a video to prove this happened.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MA3UjVbyE_I

Fast forward to 1:10 to see Gromp execute Dyrus.  MaRin... that KS'er.

> [{quoted}](name=MarhsallLee67,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=osjxbBEl,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-05-19T21:00:02.946+0000)
>
> I'd actually love to see a Skarner skin where he's wearing a Gromp suit.

Definitely not Skarner.

I mean its definitely possible.

The old Maokai originally came from the Twisted Treeline map rather than the Shadow Isles. 

From Maokai's old lore...
"During a League match on the Twisted Treeline, Maokai, an ancient oak that stood above the upper jungle, spontaneously roared to life. Ripped from the natural balance by arcane forces, his sentience was forged in chaos. Before the Adjudicators of the League could step in and suppress him, he slew all six champions participating in the match." 

But because the IoW has been retconned, they would need to find some other way to give the character a backstory.

>But because the IoW has been retconned, they would need to find some other way to give the character a backstory.

Gromp was a normal frog before. One day, he hopped onto a magic lily pad that transformed him into a powerful beast of the swamp. Now, he protects the swamp as the sacred guardian, daring any and all vagabonds to trespass onto his territory.

Did I do good.

Not enough mysterious past!

Gromp was a **mysterious** frog before. One day, he hopped onto a **mysterious** lily pad that transformed him into a powerful beast of the swamp. Now, he protects the swamp as the sacred guardian, daring any and all vagabonds to trespass **for mysterious reasons**.

ftfy
Too much mystery. Not enough people crossing lines they shouldn't be crossing.
Not enough Rammus lore madlibs
Yes, yes you did.
From what I remember, this section of Maokai's lore actually refers to a massive RP event that a bunch of rioters ran in chat rooms for players.

Sure but only if his first skin is "The Samsung Wright" or some reference to it at least.

I'll never forgot the OGN match last year where before he was gromp as wright he killed lulu for samung white; and became "The Samsung Wright".

I believe it's called the "Wight" not the "Wright" so that's where the pun came in.
"The Samsung Wight" just beautiful.

I'm pretty sure it was called the "Wight," which only makes the pun better.
Need to give gromp a dash/hop over wall ability or Rito would never make.
Because he's so op in terms of damage and range, I don't think he'll need mobility.
I often see gromp kill my own teammates whenever I tap him with a spell by accident. Guess its a feisty toad >.>
Seems legit...

A big frog champion with a spear and poison attacks would actually be fucking awesome.

Then why not just make him an epic monster like the dragon?
Team-wide objective. Gives everyone a stench that permanently fears all players in a 100 unit radius until the effect wears off or they leave the radius.
teehee
I agree this should be a real thing.
If Gromp kills the enemy, then instead of the body falling in front of him like it does in every other instance of champion death, can he just eat that champion in one gulp?

Yes.
And none of those "it was too big to leave a corpse" bullshit like Cho'Gath Feast.
Fine, but only if I get an Axebeak champion too. Or a bird champion. LEAGUE NEEDS MORE BIRDS!
